member.name: T:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController
member.summary: The BoatController class handels user interaction with boat data, either adding, getting, or putting the data.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.Register
member.summary: When the user makes the request to add a boat this is called.
member.returns: This function returns the regerstration page for a boat

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.ViewBoat
member.summary: When the user whishes to view the boat that is assoicated with their account they will make a request to this function.
member.returns: It will return one of there things, if their is a boat associated with the user then it will return the boat page which displays the users boat information. If there is no boat associated with the user the boat will redirect them to the register page. Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.RegisterBoat(Race_boat_app.Models.Boat)
member.summary: This function handels the registration of the boat for the user.
member.param: Boat is the boat that is object containing the information about the boat the user is trying to add
member.returns: Redirects the user to the boat page which will display their boats information Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.UpdateBoat(Race_boat_app.Models.Boat)
member.summary: This function handels updating the user's boat's information.
member.param: An object containg the updated information the user wants to replace their current boat with
member.returns: Redirects to action view boat to display the updated boat information Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.CreateBoatAsync(Race_boat_app.Models.Boat)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to create a Boat.
member.param: An object containing the information to be passed to the API.
member.returns: Returns the location in the API of the newly created boat.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.GetBoatAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to get a specific Boat.
member.param: The location of the boat that should be retrieved.
member.returns: Returns the boat that was retrieved from the API.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.GetBoatsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to retrieve all boats currently stored in the database
member.param: The location of the boats that should be retrieved
member.returns: Returns all the boat that was retrieved from the API

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.UpdateBoatAsync(Race_boat_app.Models.Boat)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to update the information of a specific boat
member.param: An object containing the information to be passed to the API
member.returns: Will return the status code of the APIs response, should be 420 No Content

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.BoatController.DeleteBoatAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to delete a specific boat
member.param: The ID of the boat that is to be deleted
member.returns: Will return the status code of the APIs response, should be 420 No Content

member.name: T:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController
member.summary: This controller handels communicating user requests with API responses in regards to the Events and Registering intrests in competing in an Event.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.All
member.summary: Gets all events the API has to be displayed on the websites calander.
member.returns: Returns the view events which displays all the events currently taking place. Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.RegisterEvent
member.summary: Handels the Admins request to register an event with the API.
member.returns: Returns the view where the admin can register the event with the API. Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.RegisterTeam(Race_boat_app.Models.Download)
member.summary: Handels registering a teams intrest in competing in an Event.
member.param: Contains the TeamID and EventID that is required to register for the event.
member.returns: If successful it will redirect the user to the All action which returns the event calendar Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.EventRegister(Race_boat_app.Models.EventIn)
member.summary: This function is the first part of two that allows for the creation of an Event by the Admin
member.returns: Returns the view update which will handle file uploading. Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.EditEvent(Race_boat_app.Models.Download)
member.summary: This function will handle gathering the information needed to display an events information to an administrator so that the event can be updated
member.param: This object will contain the ID of the event that needs to be updated.
member.returns: If successful it will return the event update view where an Admin can edit an events information. Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.EventUpdater(Race_boat_app.Models.EventIn)
member.summary: Handels updating an Event
member.param: An object containing an events updated information.
member.returns: If successful it will redirect the user to the All action which returns the event calendar Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.Upload
member.summary: Handels uploading a file to the API for storage and creating an event to be sent to the API
member.returns: If successful it will redirect the user to the All action which returns the event calendar Should anything go wrong it will send the user to the Error page.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.CreateEventAsync(Race_boat_app.Models.EventIn)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to create an Event.
member.param: An object containing the information to be passed to the API.
member.returns: Returns the location in the API of the newly created Event.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.AllEvents
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to retrieve all events currently stored in the database
member.returns: Returns all the events that was retrieved from the API

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.GetEventsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to retrieve all events currently stored in the database
member.param: The location of the boats that should be retrieved
member.returns: Returns all the events that was retrieved from the API

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.GetEventAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to get a specific Event
member.param: The location of the boat that should be retrieved.
member.returns: Returns the Event that was retrieved from the API.

member.name: M:Race_boat_app.Controllers.EventController.Download(Race_boat_app.Models.Download)
member.summary: This handels the user equest to download a flyer containing information about an event
member.param: An object that contains the event id that will be used to locate the correct flyer on the API
member.returns: Returns the file to the user as a download.

member.summary: Handels communicating with the API to update the information of a specific event

member.returns: Will return the status code of the APIs response, should be 420 No Content
